advancements.main.craft_augment.descript: Speed makes it Transfer Items faster, Capacity Increases the amount of stuff being sent, Storage Increases the internal buffer of the pedestal, Range increases the Linking Range, Diffuser can prevent particles.rendering, Round Robbin changes sending mode, Collision enables collision effects.
advancements.main.craft_augment.title: Making your Pedestal Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger!
advancements.main.craft_augmenttool.desc: Used to craft augments, Offhand Tool and Left Click Pedestal to remove the related Augment, Crouch Right Click Tool In Air to Swap it to the other augment tools.
advancements.main.craft_augmenttool.titl: Augmenting Pedestals (Only Effects the pedestal NOT the upgrades)
advancements.main.craft_filter.descripti: Filter Base used to Craft Filters. To Setup a filter, offhand it and Crouch Right Click a chest(or storage block) with items, this will set the filter to the chests contents. While its in your offhand, right clicking in the air will toggle white/blacklist
advancements.main.craft_filter.title: Filtering Pedestals, Useful when you keep generating flint from gravel.
advancements.main.craft_filtertool.descr: Used to Craft Filter Bases. Offhand this tool and left click a pedestal to remove inserted filter. Crouch Right Click Pedestal to display current filter settings. Crouch Right Click in air to Swap Tool
advancements.main.craft_filtertool.title: Filter or not to Filter, that is the question...
advancements.main.craft_pedestal.descrip: Pedestals are kinda like OmniTanks, they can hold Items, Fluids, Energy, and Exp. Augments Can Increase the Buffer (storage augments) as well as Speed up/Increase transfers, or just increase the range for linking.
advancements.main.craft_pedestal.title: My First Pedestal!
advancements.main.craft_toolswapper.desc: Offhand this tool and left click a pedestal to get back your tool, without needing to break the pedestal. Crouch Right Click in air to Swap Tool
advancements.main.craft_upgrade.descript: Used to Craft Upgrades, Offhand an Upgrade and Right Click to insert into a pedestal. Some Upgrades have a Mode Swap Configuration Function, Offhanding the upgrade and Crouch Right Clicking it in air will swap Modes, Right Clicking in Air will toggle the function on or off (All Functions on by default)
advancements.main.craft_upgrade.title: The Basis for Life (okay, not really, but close enough)
advancements.main.craft_upgradetool.desc: Used to Craft Upgrade Bases, Offhand tool and Left click to remove upgrades from Pedestals. Right Click pedestal to display Work Area Overlay (Blue Box), Crouch Right Click on Pedestal to Display Inserted Upgrade, Crouch Right Click in air to Swap Tool
advancements.main.craft_workcard.descrip: Work Cards are used to define where a pedestal does 'Work' Right Click or Crouch Right Click on Blocks to Set a Position. Doing so in air will clear it.
advancements.main.craft_workcard.title: Work Card (Its not a Punch Card)
advancements.main.craft_worktool.descrip: Used to Craft Work Cards, Offhand Tool and Left CLick Pedestal to Remove Work Cards, Crouch Right Click Tool In air to Swap it.
advancements.main.craft_worktool.title: Work Tool
advancements.main.root.description: The Linking tool can link pedestals together, Crouch+Right Click on a pedestal to start, again on another pedestal to finish. Linked pedestals will transfer stuff from one to the other.
advancements.main.root.title: Getting Started With Pedestals!
death.attack.pedestal1: %1$s was poked one too many times.
death.attack.pedestal1.item: %1$s was poked one too many times.
death.attack.pedestal12: %1$s, we told you not to play around with sharp things!
death.attack.pedestal12.item: %1$s, we told you not to play around with sharp things!
death.attack.pedestal5: %1$s life was taken by a mysterious force.
death.attack.pedestal5.item: %1$s life was taken by a mysterious force.
death.attack.pedestal6: %1$s caught a sword with their face.
death.attack.pedestal6.item: %1$s caught a sword with their face.
death.attack.pedestal8: %1$s wasn't carring the knife properly and slipped.
death.attack.pedestal8.item: %1$s wasn't carring the knife properly and slipped.

item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.bas: THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_nocollide: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground while paper collides with an animal.
jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_renderdif: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper when its raining.

jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_roundrobi: Crafted when a Linking Tool is Right Clicked on the ground near paper and a bird animal, like a parrot.
jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_t1_capaci: §5 Increases the transfer rate slightly for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer range slightly for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer speed slightly for each upgrade inserted.

§5 Increases the transfer range moderately for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer speed moderately for each upgrade inserted.

§5 Increases the transfer range considerably for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer speed considerably for each upgrade inserted.

jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_t4_capaci: §5 Increases the transfer rate tremendously for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer range tremendously for each upgrade inserted.
§5 Increases the transfer speed tremendously for each upgrade inserted.
jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_t4_storag: §5 Increases the storage buffer tremendously for each upgrade inserted.
jei.pedestals.augment_pedestal_transfert: §5 Enables/Disables the pedestal from transferring stuff.
§3 Right Click in Air to Toggle On/Off, Crouch Right Click in Air to Swap Type
jei.pedestals.block_catstatue_pedestal.d: §5Its a pedestal, but it looks like a cat! (made for https://www.twitch.tv/overlite) §3Offhand Dye and Right Click to Color
jei.pedestals.block_goblinstatue_pedesta: §5Its a pedestal, but it looks like a goblin! (made for https://www.twitch.tv/pedguin) §3Offhand Dye and Right Click to Color
jei.pedestals.block_omegapedestal.descri: §5Can Transport Items, Fluids, Energy, and XP. §3Offhand Dye and Right Click to Color
jei.pedestals.block_pedestal.description: §5Can Transport Items and be Augmented to transport Fluids, Energy, and XP. §3Offhand Dye and Right Click to Color
jei.pedestals.block_ratstatue_pedestal.d: §5Its a pedestal, but it looks like a rat! (made for https://www.twitch.tv/boba) §3Offhand Dye and Right Click to Color
jei.pedestals.filter_base.base_descripti: THIS FILTER BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
jei.pedestals.filter_base.description: §5 All other Filters: Offhand Filter Item and Crouch Right Click on a Chest to Set the Contents as the Filter, Craft to Clear Filter
jei.pedestals.filter_base.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to Insert the Filter In Pedestal.
§5 This Filter Filters Similar to an ItemStack Filter
§3 Offhand Filter and Right Click in Air to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click in Air to switch MODES, Crouch Right Clicking a block when in the offhand adds/removes it from the filter.
§5 This Filter Filters Similar to an Item Filter
§3 Offhand Filter and Right Click in Air to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click in Air to switch MODES, Crouch Right Clicking a block when in the offhand adds/removes it from the filter.
jei.pedestals.filter_durability.descript: §5 This Filter Filters By Item Durability
jei.pedestals.filter_durability.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchanted.interacti: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchants on an Item
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.inte: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Specific Enchants on Items
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.inte: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchant Names on Items
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.inte: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_food.description: §5 This Filter Filters out Items the Game Considers Food
jei.pedestals.filter_food.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_item.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_item_machine.intera: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_itemstack.interacti: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_itemstack_machine.i: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_mod.description: §5 This Filter Filters By Items From the Same Mod
jei.pedestals.filter_mod.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_restricted.descript: §5 This Filter Restricts How Many Items a Pedestal Can Hold
jei.pedestals.filter_restricted.interact: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_tag.description: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an Item (Items in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
jei.pedestals.filter_tag.interaction: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_tag_machine.descrip: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an Item (Items in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
jei.pedestals.filter_tag_machine.interac: §3 Offhand Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_dust.de: Stores a lot of Dust, Will Discharge the Dust after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
Stores a lot of Energy, Will Discharge the Energy after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_fluid.d: Stores a lot of Fluid, Will Discharge the Fluid after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_item.de: Stores a lot of the same Item Stacks, Will Discharge the Stacks after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_xp.desc: Stores a lot of XP, Will Discharge the XP after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.modifier_getter.descriptio: §5 This Gets Modifiers off Upgrades for use when setting up the Modifier Filter(s)
jei.pedestals.modifier_getter.interactio: §3 Offhand the Upgrade and with this in your main hand, right click.(No item in offhand will cycle the selected tag) While the item in in you main hand, crouch right click to clear all tags.
jei.pedestals.tag_getter.description: §5 This Gets Tags off Items and Blocks for use when setting up the Tag Filter
jei.pedestals.tag_getter.interaction: §3 For Blocks: Offhand Item and Crouch Right Click to get Tags from a block in-world.(Clicking in the air will instead cycle the selected tag) For Items: Offhand the item and with this in your main hand, right click.(No item in offhand will cycle the selected tag) While the item in in you main hand, crouch right click to clear all tags.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_capacity.int: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_collide.inte: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_diffuser.int: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_range.intera: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_roundrobin.i: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_speed.intera: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_storage.inte: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_augments_transfertogg: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Related Augment from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_devtool.interaction: §3 Offhand Left Tool and Left Click to Break Pedestals if in Creative Mode
jei.pedestals.tool_filtertool.interactio: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Filter from Pedestal, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.descripti: §5 Links from the Receiver to the Sender
jei.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.interacti: §3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
§5 Links from the Sender to the Receiver
§3 Crouch Right Click to select a pedestal. (Crouch Right Click on the ground to deselect)
jei.pedestals.tool_manifesttool.descript: §5 Gets the Current Details about the pedestal. Can be used to see what Augments a pedestal has.
jei.pedestals.tool_manifesttool.interact: §3 Crouch Right Click on Pedestal to Get Details, Right click to clear
jei.pedestals.tool_tagtool.interaction: §3 Offhand Items you want the tags of, and Right Click tool in your Main Hand. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_toolswapper.interacti: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Tool from Pedestal. Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_upgradetool.interacti: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Upgrade from Pedestal, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
jei.pedestals.tool_worktool.interaction: §3 Offhand Tool and Left Click to Remove Work Card from Pedestal, Crouch Right Click in Air to Switch Tool.
§5Kills Entities in the selected area. Inserted Weapons will buff the attack damage and use the enchants. Uses a Stick as a Weapon by Default
§3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates. Placing a block below this pedestal can change what Mob is targeted. (All possible options in JEI 'Mob Filters')
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.base: §5THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.desc: §5All Other Upgrades: Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES, Offhand Upgrade and Right Click to Insert Into Pedestal
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_blaster.d: §5Smelts Items like a Vanilla Blast Furnace Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_blaster.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_bottler.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breaker.d: §5'Breaks Blocks in the selected work area. Uses a Stone Pickaxe by default
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breaker.i: §3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breeder.d: §5Breeds Animals in the selected area. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to breed with those items.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breeder.i: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_chopper.d: §5'Chops Wood/Mushroom/Leaf Blocks in the selected work area. Uses a Iron Axe by default.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_chopper.i: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_cobblegen: §5Based on the 'Below' Block and Inserted Tool, will generate items putting the outputs in the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_crafter.d: §5Crafts Items Like a vanilla crafter. Bind pedestals to the Pedestal Locations Card, the bound order matters! insert upgrade into pedestal, and insert crafting items in order
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_crafter.i: §3Uses Pedestal Locations (Card) to define selected pedestals which are used as the crafting tables slots.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_drain.des: §5Rapidly Places fluid source blocks from the pedestals inventory into the selected work area, from bedrock to world height. Uses a Iron Pickaxe by default.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_drain.int: §3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1 high Work Area itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_dropper.d: §5'Drops' or Spawns in Items/XP/Energy in world in the selected locations/areas
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_dropper.i: §3'Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_export.de: §5Exports from the Pedestal. By default uses the inventory "below" the pedestal. If you have infused "Remote Inv. Targeting" this will instead use the inventories defined by a Work Locations (Card).
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_export.in: §3This upgrade attempts to export all of the allowed types to the target inventory. When using "Remote Inv. Targeting" at most 8 remote inventories are supported, although this only exports to the first inventory that has space.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fan.descr: §5Moves Entities in the selected area. Direction of Movement based on Pedestals Placement Direction
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fan.inter: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates. Placing a block below this pedestal can change what Mob is targeted. (All possible options in JEI 'Mob Filters')
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fertilize: §5Grows Crops in the selected area. Doesnt require bonemeal, but using bonemeal from the pedestals inventory will greatly hasten crop growth.
§3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_filler.de: §5Rapidly Places Non-Crop Blocks from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_filler.in: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1 high area itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fluidconv: §3Fluids from the Pedestals Inventory will be consumed for this process.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_generator: §5Burns Vanilla Furnace Fuels for RF Production
§3Requires Fuel to be put into the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_harvester: §5Breaks Fully Grown Crops. Uses a Stone Hoe by default.
§3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_hiveharve: §5Harvests selected beehive blocks. Uses Sheers by default. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to harvest the hive with those items instead.(Like Glass Bottles)
§3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_import.de: §5Imports to the Pedestal. By default uses the inventory "below" the pedestal. If you have infused "Remote Inv. Targeting" this will instead use the inventories defined by a Work Locations (Card).
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_import.in: §3This upgrade attempts to import all of the allowed types from the target inventory. When using "Remote Inv. Targeting" at most 8 remote inventories are supported, although this only imports from the first inventory that successfully transfers.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_magnet.de: §5'Magnets' up items in the selected work area.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_magnet.in: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define magnet area.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_milker.de: §5Milks Animals in the selected area. Uses a Bucket by default.(Will attempt to put the fluid in the pedestal if its a valid fluid, otherwise itll do nothing) Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to milk with those items instead.(Like Bowls)
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_milker.in: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_modificat: §5Infuses modifications into upgrades to enhance them. Bind pedestals to the upgrade, the bound order matters! insert upgrade into pedestal on top of chest, and insert infusion items in order (upgrade goes in below chest)
§3Uses Pedestal Locations (Card) to define the pedestals used for its crafting 'grid' inputs.
§5Waits till the Pedestal is Full of Fluid/Energy/XP/Dust and then Packages it up into an Item.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_placer.de: §5Places Non-Crop Blocks from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_placer.in: §3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_planter.d: §5Places Crop Blocks/Seeds from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_planter.i: §3Uses either Work Area (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_pump.desc: §5Pumps fluid from source blocks or cauldrons in the selected work area. By default this treats a waterlogged block as an infinite water source.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_pump.inte: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you have infused 'Operate to Bedrock' it will instead work from the defined Work Area (must be 1-block high) down to bedrock exactly once (emitting red particles when done).
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_quarry.de: §5Breaks Blocks in the selected work area, dropping the resulting items and experience at the pedestal position. Uses an Iron Pickaxe by default.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_quarry.in: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you have infused 'Operate to Bedrock' it will instead work from the defined Work Area (must be 1-block high) down to bedrock exactly once (emitting red particles when done).
§3Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES. Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_rfcharger: §5Takes Items from Below Inventory and charges them with FE energy from the pedestals storage
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_sheerer.d: §5Shears Animals in the selected area. Uses Shears by default. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to shear with those items instead.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_sheerer.i: §3Uses Work Area (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smelter.d: §5Smelts Items like a Vanilla Furnace Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smelter.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smoker.de: §5Smelts Items like a Vanilla Smoker Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smoker.in: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_unbottler: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_unpackage: §5Takes Packages and Un-Packages them into the pedestals buffer.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_void.inte: §3Offhand Upgrade and Crouch Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.workcard_area.description: §5Right Click two blocks to define the Work Area corresponding to all locations contained between those points. Right Click in the air to clear all existing selections.
jei.pedestals.workcard_locations.descrip: §5Right Click a block to add it to the defined Work Area if not already present, or to remove it from the defined Work Area if it was already present. Right Click in the air to clear all existing selections.
jei.pedestals.workcard_pedestals.descrip: §5Right Click a block to add it to the defined Work Area if not already present, or to remove it from the defined Work Area if it was already present. Right Click in the air to clear all existing selections.
pedestal.book.landing.text: Welcome to Pedestals.$(br2)Pedestals is a tech mod with the unique design twist of purposefully avoiding in-game GUIs.$(br2)This mod aims to provide a unique way to store, display, and transfer your items, fluids, energy, and experience between linked Pedestals. It also provides ways to automate various useful tasks (e.g. farming crops / trees / mobs, smelting, material generation, and more) through the use of Pedestal Upgrades.
pedestal.book.name: Pedestals Guide (WIP)
pedestals.augments.description_shift: Press Shift to See Modifications of this Augment
pedestals.augments_capacity_xprate: Increases XP Level Transfer Rate by:
pedestals.augments_speed_ticksreduced: Decrease Number of Ticks Between Transfers:
pedestals.augments_storage_itemrate: Increases Number of Stacks Allowed In Pedestal:
pedestals.augments_storage_xprate: Increases Xp Level Buffer In Pedestal:
pedestals.bottler.placementinventory: Item Inputs go into Inventory Below the Pedestal
pedestals.bottler.placementpedestal: Pedestal Needs Inventory Below it for Item Inputs
pedestals.cobble_gen.tool: §cThe Default tool used is this, but Offhand inserting one can vastly change up what is produced (enchants factor in as well)
pedestals.cobble_gen.warning: §cThe Pedestal Simulates Breaking the Result Block, the Broken remains are what is Actually Generated
pedestals.filter.tooltip_filterbase: THIS FILTER BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
pedestals.fluidconverter.returnedstack: Converts fluids in the Pedestals Inventory
pedestals.pedestal.message_redstone_disa: Redstone Signal Strength Needed to Activate Pedestal:
pedestals.tool.augment.diffuser_not: Does not have Particle Diffuser Augment
pedestals.tool.augment.roundrobin_not: Does not have Round Robin Augment
pedestals.tool.augment.transfertoggle_no: Does not have Transfer Toggle Augment
